name: CGDD-Project2-Memepedia
description:
Our team has the initial idea to create a game with the present famous internet meme. We want to combine meme culture and gameplay together, focusing on combination of art and game. The main character, Gazi, travels through different meme scenes and try to steal the essential objects as key to next level.

Designer - Jack Ma

Art - Aaron Zhan

Programmer - Jason Xia
